abstract: The technology giant — which recently rolled out Google Offers, its own location-based daily deal service — has acquired The Dealmap, a start-up that aggregates discounts from hundreds of group-buying sites.
snippet: The technology giant — which recently rolled out Google Offers, its own location-based daily deal service — has acquired The Dealmap, a start-up that aggregates discounts from hundreds of group-buying sites.
lead_paragraph: Google may have failed in its takeover attempt of Groupon last year, but it’s not giving up on the social shopping market.
